Net Income: net income loss including portion attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest

Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax
other comprehensive income loss net of tax excluding redeemable noncontrolling interests

Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value acquisitions
Stock-Based Compensation: stock issued during period value share based compensation

Stock Repurchases: treasury stock retired cost method amount
treasury stock value acquired cost method
__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
temporary equity other comprehensive income loss
